name: Basic Invaders (Vic20 + 3K)
description:
I decided to see if I could write a space invaders game in BASIC on the vic20.  The result is just about playable.  Has a few bugs but I don't want to slow the game play down any more.  Have fun with it.

Requires a Vic20 with 3K RAM expansion + Joystick

Zip file contains the CBM prg studio project files for you to view & modify.
